name: PAN syslog TRAFFIC with sample data

search.query:
dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic  
| timestats  count() by action

dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic
| summarize count() by strcat(action, "/", src_zone)

dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic
| summarize count() by strcat(action, "/", dest_zone)

dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic 
| extend apd = strcat(action, "/", protocol, "/", dest_port)
| summarize count() by apd

elements.title: Event Outcome by Transport and Destination Port - Top 10

search.query:
dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic
| extend apd = strcat(action, "/", app)
| summarize count() by apd

dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic 
| where isnotnull(action_source)
| summarize count() by action_source

elements.title: Distribution of Traffic Events by Action Source

search.query:
dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic
| where isnotnull(tunnel_id) 
| summarize count() by tunnel_id

elements.title: Distribution of Traffic Events by Tunnel Type

search.query:
dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic 
| summarize count() by action

elements.title: Distribution of Traffic Events by Action taken on Session

search.query:
dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic 
| where action=="deny" 
| project _time, src_ip, src_port, dest_ip, dest_port, session_end_reason
| top 10 by _time desc

dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic
| where isnotnull(session_end_reason)
| summarize count() by session_end_reason

elements.title: Distribution of Traffic Events by Session End Reason

search.query:
dataset=$vt_lookups lookupFile=palo_syslog_sample_traffic
| top 10 by _time desc
| project _time, src_ip, src_port, dest_ip, dest_port, session_end_reason
